# Spacings

## Tokens

<SpacingTokens />

## Usage in CSS

Whenever you want to apply this style, you can use the corresponding variable.

```css
.myClass {
  margin-right: var(--spacing-xs);
}
```

## Usage with TailwindCSS

Whenever you want to use a spacing from Grapes with TailwindCSS, you can use the corresponding keys.

Example with margin:

<SpacingTailwind />

See documentation from TailwindCSS: [https://tailwindcss.com/docs/margin](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/margin).
